title.en: Prism Spectrum: The Dance of Refraction

description.ko: 삼각형 유리 프리즘을 통과하며 찬란한 스펙트럼으로 갈라지는 백색광을 시각적으로 탐구하며, 굴절과 색 분산의 물리학을 보여줍니다.
description.en: A visual exploration of white light splitting into a vibrant spectrum as it passes through a triangular glass prism, showcasing the physics of refraction and chromatic dispersion.

prompt: Cinematic shot of a sharp triangular glass prism on a dark reflective surface, a single beam of pure white light hitting the side and refracting into a vivid, wide rainbow spectrum, caustic light patterns, hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, ray tracing, soft bokeh background.
